Should you not be able to select one of the items you wish to purchase, this means the item is currently not available. Should you be happy with your final selection, you can proceed to the checkout. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? In the MAC Mode online shop, there is no maximum or minimum order limit. However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. In the case that several people order one article the same colour, width and length combination at the same time, it is possible that we are not able to deliver all goods that have been ordered. It is possible that products that are sold out particular size and colour combination are available at later time, however this does not concern our entire product range. We are not able to make binding prediction whether or not product be available the future. We do recommend however to visit our online shop regular intervals to check for availabilities. 6. Payment methods 6.1 Which payment methods are available? The MAC online shop offers the following payment methods: Credit card (Visa & Mastercard) The MAC online shop accepts the following credit cards: Visa, Euro/Mastercard To transmit the highly sensitive data securely, we use the SSL (secure socket layer) technology to encrypt your data. We ask you to consider that orders that have been placed via credit card may take up to one day longer as the credit card details have to be verified. Paypal Paypal is free online payment service, which helps you to make payments quickly and securely. Your bank or credit card details are only stored at Paypal. Therefore they are not being transmitted while you are effectuating your payment. This makes payment via Paypal particularly secure. As Paypal payments are usually made very quickly, your merchandise can be sent out quicker. As soon as your payment has been confirmed by Paypal, your parcel is sent on its way. For more information regarding Paypal visit http://www.paypal.com Cash on delivery The amount is paid cash at delivery of the ordered goods to the postman or messenger directly. The responsible parcel service however adds delivery fine of 2-3€ per delivery to the overall amount. Prepayment Should you have selected the payment method prepayment, we reserve your items for duration of five days. During this time span, we kindly ask you to make your payment indicated on your order confirmation to the following account: Kontoinhaber: PVS Fulfillment-Service GmbH i.A. Mac Mode GmbH & Co.KGaA Kontonummer: 891 247 709 Bankleitzahl: 600 100 70 IBAN: DE20 6001 0070 0891 2477 09 BIC: PBNKDEFF600 As soon as your payment has been received on our account, we immediately send out your purchased goods. 7. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed. This means that the order you have placed on Friday is either sent out the same day or Monday. However, we ask for your understanding that sometimes, the delivery of goods can take little longer due to large number of requests during sale or holiday periods. In order to check the status of your order, you can consult „My MAC“. As however this information depends on the logistic partner we are working with, please understand that the information is rather indication than binding information. Also, you are receiving tracking number the „Dispatch confirmation“, which you can use to track your parcel on the DHL website. 7.2 Is there express delivery? Unfortunately we do not offer express delivery at this stage. 7.3 Can I specify one address for the invoice and another for the invoice? Yes, you can specify differing delivery address. In this case, MAC may however offer only secure payment methods. Please note that this option may not apply when placing your first order the MAC online shop. 8. Returning of orders Please take note that it might very well take 5 to 7 working days until your order arrives our logistic center and can be booked back. Should you not receive any notification after over 8 working days, you can certainly contact our customer service center. However, we kindly ask you to hold on to your registration of the parcel to enable potential investigations for the parcel. Naturally we are trying to re-book your parcel as soon as possible. Please keep mind that due to seasonal influences (i.e. Christmas, holidays, sales periods…) this may take couple of days longer than usual. 8.1 How much time do I have to return goods? You can return all goods purchased the online shop without justifying any reasons within two weeks. If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label 8.2 Where do I send returns to? If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH c/o MAC Mode Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm For questions regarding your returns, please consult our service center: Phone: 0711 7252-304201, Fax: 0711 7252-30799, E-Mail: shop@mac-mode.com Only PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH he right to return goods purchased the MAC online shop. We kindly ask you not to send any merchandise purchased the MAC online shop to the MAC headquarters directly. 8.3 How are my returns balanced out with my customer account? If you have already paid for your order via prepayment, cash on delivery or credit card, we reimburse the amount onto your account. Please make sure to supply us with your account details on the return slip. 8.4 In which condition do I have to return items? Naturally we can only accept unused, unworn goods without traces of usage and which still bears the original labels. 8.5 Can I return the goods I have purchased the MAC online store MAC outlet or at any MAC retailer? The MAC online store operates independently from other MAC retailers. Therefore, we ask you to take note that it is neither possible to return nor make complaint regarding products purchased the MAC online shop or vice versa. Should you want to return or complain about MAC products you have purchased at MAC retailer, we kindly ask you to return this items to the MAC retailer conjunction with the receipt. 9. Complaints High product quality is MAC’s priority. Unfortunately, rare cases small number of items does not reflect our high quality standards. Should this be the case with your MAC product, we kindly ask you to accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused. Please do return the product regarding the complaint together with short description of your complaint and your contact data to the following address: PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH Retourenabteilung c/o MAC Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm A member of our service team check your complaint and get touch with you shortly afterwards. Please do keep mind that we can only and exclusively accept complaints regarding products that have been purchased the MAC online shop under this address. About Us Privacy Newsletter Sitemap FAQ

MAC Mode Privacy Log In EN / DE Search Click to perform search. Home Women Men News Online shop Shopfinder Company My Mac PRIVACY STATEMENT MAC 1. Your privacy is our concern We are very happy about your interest our company, our products and service and would like you to feel safe regarding your personal data and privacy. We take the safety of your privacy very serious. The compliance to the Federal Data Protection Act is matter of course for us. We would like you to know which data we collect and use. We have taken measures that ensure that we and our external service providers meet regulations regarding data protection. 2. Collection and use of personal data Personal data is information regarding your identity. Examples thereof are indications of your name, address, phone number, email address. For the use of our website, it is not necessary to leave any personal data at all. In certain cases however, it is necessary to leave personal data if you wish us to provide service. The same applies for the mailing of information material, ordered goods or reply to individual requests or questions. Should this be necessary, we point this out. In addition to that, we only safe or process data, which you make available to us voluntarily or automatically. Should you wish service, we usually only collect data, which we need to provide this service. Should we ask for additional data we only do this on voluntary basis. The processing of personal data only and exclusively serve to fulfil the requested service and to safeguard our own justified business interests. 3. Purpose of personal data Your personal data that is made available by you is generally being used to answer your queries, to deal with your oders or to give you access to particular information or offers. In order to manage customer relations, it can be necessary that we assign service provider to use this data to inform you about product offers provide you with information about our products or conduct online survey, which we use to improve our offer. Naturally we respect if you do not want to supply your personal data order to support our customer relationship (in particular for direct marketing or marketing surveys). We however under no circumstances sell your data to third parties or market them elsewhere. 4. Specific Use The personal data we have collected about you only be used for the purposes communicated to you and not be shared with third parties unless you give your explicit permission to do so. Collection of personal data, as well as their transmission to institutions that we are obligated to share data with by law or court only be carried out within the regulatory framework respectively court decision. Our employees and the service providers we collaborate with are obligated to discretion and adhering to the provisions of the German Federal Data Protection Act. 5. Duration of storage Personal data, which has been submitted via our website, be saved until its purpose has been served. Where filing periods are stipulated by the provisions of commercial and/or fiscal law, the storage period for certain data may be up to 10 years. In addition, the IP address of the customer at the time of order be saved order to assure data security (this means order to prevent misuse and for criminal prosecution) for the duration of one year. 6. Data collection Your visit on our website is protocolled. What is protocolled is generally the IP address you are using from your PC, date, time, type of browser and the operating system of your PC as well as the sites you are looking at. These circumstances do not enable us to establish connection between you and this data. This data is only used for data security reasons and to optimize our online offer. Other evaluation of this data – apart from statistical purposes and anonymous form is not made. No personal surf profiles are created or profiled. Additionally, personal data is only saved if you input the data, i.e. within the registration process, survey, raffle, online application or order to perform contract. You be informed about the purpose of the data collection and your data be transmitted encrypted form. 7. Cookies While visiting our website, we may be placing information – form of cookies – on your computer. Cookies are small text files, which are sent from webserver to your browser and are saved on your hard drive. Thereby, no personal data of the user is saved, merely the internet protocol address. This information serves to recognize you during your next visit on our website and ease your navigation. Cookies enable us to adapt our website to your interest and to save your password you don’t have to fill it each time you want to log on our website. Of course you can browse our website without cookies. In order to do so, you can avoid cookies to be saved on your hard drive, you have to select the option “Do not accept cookies” your browser settings. For detailed information, please consult the instructions of your browser manufacturer. If you do not accept cookies, certain functionality of our website might be restricted. 8. Children and adolescents Minors and underage people should not submit any personal information without the consent of their parents or guardian. We do not ask for any personal data of children and minors, do not collect or process it and certainly do not forward it to third parties. 9. Liability All information on this website has been checked thoroughly. However, we cannot take any guarantee for correctness, completeness and topicality of our contents. 10. Security We have taken technical and organisational security measures order to protect your personal data of loss, destruction, manipulation and unauthorized access. All employees and all third parties that are involved with the processing of data are obliged to comply with the German Federal Data Protection Act. In the case of collection and processing of personal data, all information is transmitted encrypted form to avoid abuse of the data by third parties. Our security measures are constantly revised and continuously adapted to technological developments. 11. Information regarding the location of the web server (§13 Ab. 1 TMG) The processing of data that we receive via our website is made on our servers Germany. 12. Changes of privacy statement We reserve the right to change our security and privacy if necessary due to technical developments. In these cases, we adapt our privacy statement accordingly. Please do check our privacy statement for updates. 13. Links to other websites Occasionally, we link to websites of third parties. Despite our careful selection process to do so, we cannot give any guarantee or liability for correctness, completeness and topicality of its contents. Also, this privacy statement does not apply to websites we have linked to. Please do inform yourself about the privacy statements associated with these sites directly. 14. Right of access and right to object Should you not want the storing of your personal data or the data not be accurate anymore, we certainly delete your data if requested or correct them accordingly – as far as this is possible within governing law. Data for accounting and bookkeeping purposes are not affected by retraction or deletion. If you wish so, you may receive information regarding all personal data that we have saved about you our database. Please contact us at Mac Mode GmbH & Co KGaA, Datenschutz, Industriestr. 2, 93192 Wald/Roßbach or send email to datenschutz@mac-mode.com MAC Mode GmbH & Co KGaA June 2012 About Us Privacy Newsletter Sitemap FAQ

Complaints 1. Account („My MAC“) 1.1 Welche Vorteile bietet „My MAC“ Account? Setting up „My MAC“ account is free and without any obligations. With the set-up of account you can deposit up to three delivery addresses. The purchase our online shop is even more comfortable as the data you registered when setting up your account is automatically filled in. Also you have the possibility to look into your delivery status directly. In addition to your “My MAC” account, we recommend to subscribe to our newsletter order to be updated about specials and promotions regarding our online shop assortment. The newsletter subscription is free and can be revoked at all times. All data we receive of you be treated according to our data privacy policy ( LINK ). We – under no circumstances – forward your data to third parties for advertising purposes. 1.2 Do I have to register order to make purchase something the MAC online shop? No. Of course you can shop online shop as guest without having user profile. 1.3 How can I register? You can register during the order process. After placing order successfully, you receive Link You can opt for registration of your user profile the course of the ordering process. Having done your order, you receive confirmation link. You can unlock your user profile with this link. You can only confirm your user profile by clicking on the link the confirmation email and the completion of your registration data. 1.4 How can I change my password? At “My MAC” you can change your password the category “My Profile”. Please log and go to “Change password”. Please keep mind that your password has to consist of at least 5 digits. 1.5 What can I do if I forgot my password or my username? If you forgot your password for your „My MAC“ account, please click the „forgot password“ link and we send you email to reset your password to the email address you registered with, which explain how to proceed. 2. Newsletter 2.1 Subscription You can subscribe to receive the MAC newsletter two ways. First of all you can click on „Newsletter“ the footer of the website, which lead you to the newsletter subscription page. Secondly, you can register to receive the newsletter during the check-out process. 2.2 Unsubscription of the newsletter You can unsubscribe of the MAC newsletter at all times and without justifying any reasons. In order to do that, please click on the link at the bottom of every newsletter. Upon us receiving your unsubscription of the newsletter means also, that we not use your data any longer and stop sending you our newsletters. 2.3 Revocation newsletter If you have subscribed to our newsletter and given your consent that MAC uses your data to send newsletters, you can at all times revoke this by clicking on the designated link each newsletter. After receiving your revocation, we not use your data any further and stop the sending of the newsletter immediately. 3. Collection and use of personal data 3.1 What do we do for the security of your personal data? The safety of your personal data is our biggest concern. Generally speaking, you can visit our website without leaving any data at all. Should you however place order or subscribe to our newsletter, we do need your data. Certainly, we transmit this data via SSL (secure socket layer) connection. For your own safety, our security standards for creating your password are very high. 3.2 What do we use your data for? All information you are making about yourself or your interest is exclusively used to offer you the best service possible and to improve our website to your standards. Under no circumstances is your private data forwarded to any third party for marketing or advertising reasons. In order to read our Privacy Statement, click HERE The data that is needed for reasons of business transaction is saved and be exchanged with service providers. All personal data is treated with highest security and confidentiality standards. For reasons of credit assessment and address verification and potentially collection of payment, exchange of data with correspondent companies is made. 3.3 Data Security throughout the order process. While ordering online with us, we treat your data with the highest care: All data submitted by you are protected by our technical security systems. During data transfer, we use the so-called SSL system (secure socket layer), which you can recognize by the https:// instead of the http:// your browser. This encryption protocol is used to securely transfer of data via the internet. 4. Order & order process 4.1 Order & order process? You can put your product into the shopping cart after selecting colour, width and length. Once you have placed all desired products into the shopping cart, you can go to the shopping cart and modify your selection. Should you not be able to select one of the items you wish to purchase, this means the item is currently not available. Should you be happy with your final selection, you can proceed to the checkout. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? In the MAC Mode online shop, there is no maximum or minimum order limit. However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. In the case that several people order one article the same colour, width and length combination at the same time, it is possible that we are not able to deliver all goods that have been ordered. It is possible that products that are sold out particular size and colour combination are available at later time, however this does not concern our entire product range. We are not able to make binding prediction whether or not product be available the future. We do recommend however to visit our online shop regular intervals to check for availabilities. 6. Payment methods 6.1 Which payment methods are available? The MAC online shop offers the following payment methods: Credit card (Visa & Mastercard) The MAC online shop accepts the following credit cards: Visa, Euro/Mastercard To transmit the highly sensitive data securely, we use the SSL (secure socket layer) technology to encrypt your data. We ask you to consider that orders that have been placed via credit card may take up to one day longer as the credit card details have to be verified. Paypal Paypal is free online payment service, which helps you to make payments quickly and securely. Your bank or credit card details are only stored at Paypal. Therefore they are not being transmitted while you are effectuating your payment. This makes payment via Paypal particularly secure. As Paypal payments are usually made very quickly, your merchandise can be sent out quicker. As soon as your payment has been confirmed by Paypal, your parcel is sent on its way. For more information regarding Paypal visit http://www.paypal.com Cash on delivery The amount is paid cash at delivery of the ordered goods to the postman or messenger directly. The responsible parcel service however adds delivery fine of 2-3€ per delivery to the overall amount. Prepayment Should you have selected the payment method prepayment, we reserve your items for duration of five days. During this time span, we kindly ask you to make your payment indicated on your order confirmation to the following account: Kontoinhaber: PVS Fulfillment-Service GmbH i.A. Mac Mode GmbH & Co.KGaA Kontonummer: 891 247 709 Bankleitzahl: 600 100 70 IBAN: DE20 6001 0070 0891 2477 09 BIC: PBNKDEFF600 As soon as your payment has been received on our account, we immediately send out your purchased goods. 7. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed. This means that the order you have placed on Friday is either sent out the same day or Monday. However, we ask for your understanding that sometimes, the delivery of goods can take little longer due to large number of requests during sale or holiday periods. In order to check the status of your order, you can consult „My MAC“. As however this information depends on the logistic partner we are working with, please understand that the information is rather indication than binding information. Also, you are receiving tracking number the „Dispatch confirmation“, which you can use to track your parcel on the DHL website. 7.2 Is there express delivery? Unfortunately we do not offer express delivery at this stage. 7.3 Can I specify one address for the invoice and another for the invoice? Yes, you can specify differing delivery address. In this case, MAC may however offer only secure payment methods. Please note that this option may not apply when placing your first order the MAC online shop. 8. Returning of orders Please take note that it might very well take 5 to 7 working days until your order arrives our logistic center and can be booked back. Should you not receive any notification after over 8 working days, you can certainly contact our customer service center. However, we kindly ask you to hold on to your registration of the parcel to enable potential investigations for the parcel. Naturally we are trying to re-book your parcel as soon as possible. Please keep mind that due to seasonal influences (i.e. Christmas, holidays, sales periods…) this may take couple of days longer than usual. 8.1 How much time do I have to return goods? You can return all goods purchased the online shop without justifying any reasons within two weeks. If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label 8.2 Where do I send returns to? If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH c/o MAC Mode Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm For questions regarding your returns, please consult our service center: Phone: 0711 7252-304201, Fax: 0711 7252-30799, E-Mail: shop@mac-mode.com Only PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH he right to return goods purchased the MAC online shop. We kindly ask you not to send any merchandise purchased the MAC online shop to the MAC headquarters directly. 8.3 How are my returns balanced out with my customer account? If you have already paid for your order via prepayment, cash on delivery or credit card, we reimburse the amount onto your account. Please make sure to supply us with your account details on the return slip. 8.4 In which condition do I have to return items? Naturally we can only accept unused, unworn goods without traces of usage and which still bears the original labels. 8.5 Can I return the goods I have purchased the MAC online store MAC outlet or at any MAC retailer? The MAC online store operates independently from other MAC retailers. Therefore, we ask you to take note that it is neither possible to return nor make complaint regarding products purchased the MAC online shop or vice versa. Should you want to return or complain about MAC products you have purchased at MAC retailer, we kindly ask you to return this items to the MAC retailer conjunction with the receipt. 9. Complaints High product quality is MAC’s priority. Unfortunately, rare cases small number of items does not reflect our high quality standards. Should this be the case with your MAC product, we kindly ask you to accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused. Please do return the product regarding the complaint together with short description of your complaint and your contact data to the following address: PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH Retourenabteilung c/o MAC Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm A member of our service team check your complaint and get touch with you shortly afterwards. Please do keep mind that we can only and exclusively accept complaints regarding products that have been purchased the MAC online shop under this address. About Us Privacy Newsletter Sitemap FAQ

Complaints 1. Account („My MAC“) 1.1 Welche Vorteile bietet „My MAC“ Account? Setting up „My MAC“ account is free and without any obligations. With the set-up of account you can deposit up to three delivery addresses. The purchase our online shop is even more comfortable as the data you registered when setting up your account is automatically filled in. Also you have the possibility to look into your delivery status directly. In addition to your “My MAC” account, we recommend to subscribe to our newsletter order to be updated about specials and promotions regarding our online shop assortment. The newsletter subscription is free and can be revoked at all times. All data we receive of you be treated according to our data privacy policy ( LINK ). We – under no circumstances – forward your data to third parties for advertising purposes. 1.2 Do I have to register order to make purchase something the MAC online shop? No. Of course you can shop online shop as guest without having user profile. 1.3 How can I register? You can register during the order process. After placing order successfully, you receive Link You can opt for registration of your user profile the course of the ordering process. Having done your order, you receive confirmation link. You can unlock your user profile with this link. You can only confirm your user profile by clicking on the link the confirmation email and the completion of your registration data. 1.4 How can I change my password? At “My MAC” you can change your password the category “My Profile”. Please log and go to “Change password”. Please keep mind that your password has to consist of at least 5 digits. 1.5 What can I do if I forgot my password or my username? If you forgot your password for your „My MAC“ account, please click the „forgot password“ link and we send you email to reset your password to the email address you registered with, which explain how to proceed. 2. Newsletter 2.1 Subscription You can subscribe to receive the MAC newsletter two ways. First of all you can click on „Newsletter“ the footer of the website, which lead you to the newsletter subscription page. Secondly, you can register to receive the newsletter during the check-out process. 2.2 Unsubscription of the newsletter You can unsubscribe of the MAC newsletter at all times and without justifying any reasons. In order to do that, please click on the link at the bottom of every newsletter. Upon us receiving your unsubscription of the newsletter means also, that we not use your data any longer and stop sending you our newsletters. 2.3 Revocation newsletter If you have subscribed to our newsletter and given your consent that MAC uses your data to send newsletters, you can at all times revoke this by clicking on the designated link each newsletter. After receiving your revocation, we not use your data any further and stop the sending of the newsletter immediately. 3. Collection and use of personal data 3.1 What do we do for the security of your personal data? The safety of your personal data is our biggest concern. Generally speaking, you can visit our website without leaving any data at all. Should you however place order or subscribe to our newsletter, we do need your data. Certainly, we transmit this data via SSL (secure socket layer) connection. For your own safety, our security standards for creating your password are very high. 3.2 What do we use your data for? All information you are making about yourself or your interest is exclusively used to offer you the best service possible and to improve our website to your standards. Under no circumstances is your private data forwarded to any third party for marketing or advertising reasons. In order to read our Privacy Statement, click HERE The data that is needed for reasons of business transaction is saved and be exchanged with service providers. All personal data is treated with highest security and confidentiality standards. For reasons of credit assessment and address verification and potentially collection of payment, exchange of data with correspondent companies is made. 3.3 Data Security throughout the order process. While ordering online with us, we treat your data with the highest care: All data submitted by you are protected by our technical security systems. During data transfer, we use the so-called SSL system (secure socket layer), which you can recognize by the https:// instead of the http:// your browser. This encryption protocol is used to securely transfer of data via the internet. 4. Order & order process 4.1 Order & order process? You can put your product into the shopping cart after selecting colour, width and length. Once you have placed all desired products into the shopping cart, you can go to the shopping cart and modify your selection. Should you not be able to select one of the items you wish to purchase, this means the item is currently not available. Should you be happy with your final selection, you can proceed to the checkout. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. Also you have the possibility to look into your delivery status directly. In addition to your “My MAC” account, we recommend to subscribe to our newsletter order to be updated about specials and promotions regarding our online shop assortment. The newsletter subscription is free and can be revoked at all times. All data we receive of you be treated according to our data privacy policy ( LINK ). We – under no circumstances – forward your data to third parties for advertising purposes. 1.2 Do I have to register order to make purchase something the MAC online shop? No. Of course you can shop online shop as guest without having user profile. 1.3 How can I register? You can register during the order process. After placing order successfully, you receive Link You can opt for registration of your user profile the course of the ordering process. Having done your order, you receive confirmation link. You can unlock your user profile with this link. You can only confirm your user profile by clicking on the link the confirmation email and the completion of your registration data. 1.4 How can I change my password? At “My MAC” you can change your password the category “My Profile”. Please log and go to “Change password”. Please keep mind that your password has to consist of at least 5 digits. 1.5 What can I do if I forgot my password or my username? If you forgot your password for your „My MAC“ account, please click the „forgot password“ link and we send you email to reset your password to the email address you registered with, which explain how to proceed. 2. Newsletter 2.1 Subscription You can subscribe to receive the MAC newsletter two ways. First of all you can click on „Newsletter“ the footer of the website, which lead you to the newsletter subscription page. Secondly, you can register to receive the newsletter during the check-out process. 2.2 Unsubscription of the newsletter You can unsubscribe of the MAC newsletter at all times and without justifying any reasons. In order to do that, please click on the link at the bottom of every newsletter. Upon us receiving your unsubscription of the newsletter means also, that we not use your data any longer and stop sending you our newsletters. 2.3 Revocation newsletter If you have subscribed to our newsletter and given your consent that MAC uses your data to send newsletters, you can at all times revoke this by clicking on the designated link each newsletter. After receiving your revocation, we not use your data any further and stop the sending of the newsletter immediately. 3. Collection and use of personal data 3.1 What do we do for the security of your personal data? The safety of your personal data is our biggest concern. Generally speaking, you can visit our website without leaving any data at all. Should you however place order or subscribe to our newsletter, we do need your data. Certainly, we transmit this data via SSL (secure socket layer) connection. For your own safety, our security standards for creating your password are very high. 3.2 What do we use your data for? All information you are making about yourself or your interest is exclusively used to offer you the best service possible and to improve our website to your standards. Under no circumstances is your private data forwarded to any third party for marketing or advertising reasons. In order to read our Privacy Statement, click HERE The data that is needed for reasons of business transaction is saved and be exchanged with service providers. All personal data is treated with highest security and confidentiality standards. For reasons of credit assessment and address verification and potentially collection of payment, exchange of data with correspondent companies is made. 3.3 Data Security throughout the order process. While ordering online with us, we treat your data with the highest care: All data submitted by you are protected by our technical security systems. During data transfer, we use the so-called SSL system (secure socket layer), which you can recognize by the https:// instead of the http:// your browser. This encryption protocol is used to securely transfer of data via the internet. 4. Order & order process 4.1 Order & order process? You can put your product into the shopping cart after selecting colour, width and length. Once you have placed all desired products into the shopping cart, you can go to the shopping cart and modify your selection. Should you not be able to select one of the items you wish to purchase, this means the item is currently not available. Should you be happy with your final selection, you can proceed to the checkout. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? In the MAC Mode online shop, there is no maximum or minimum order limit. However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. In the case that several people order one article the same colour, width and length combination at the same time, it is possible that we are not able to deliver all goods that have been ordered. It is possible that products that are sold out particular size and colour combination are available at later time, however this does not concern our entire product range. We are not able to make binding prediction whether or not product be available the future. We do recommend however to visit our online shop regular intervals to check for availabilities. 6. The MAC online shop offers the following payment methods: Credit card (Visa & Mastercard) The MAC online shop accepts the following credit cards: Visa, Euro/Mastercard To transmit the highly sensitive data securely, we use the SSL (secure socket layer) technology to encrypt your data. We ask you to consider that orders that have been placed via credit card may take up to one day longer as the credit card details have to be verified. Paypal Paypal is free online payment service, which helps you to make payments quickly and securely. Your bank or credit card details are only stored at Paypal. Therefore they are not being transmitted while you are effectuating your payment. This makes payment via Paypal particularly secure. As Paypal payments are usually made very quickly, your merchandise can be sent out quicker. As soon as your payment has been confirmed by Paypal, your parcel is sent on its way. For more information regarding Paypal visit http://www.paypal.com Cash on delivery The amount is paid cash at delivery of the ordered goods to the postman or messenger directly. The responsible parcel service however adds delivery fine of 2-3€ per delivery to the overall amount. Prepayment Should you have selected the payment method prepayment, we reserve your items for duration of five days. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed. This means that the order you have placed on Friday is either sent out the same day or Monday. However, we ask for your understanding that sometimes, the delivery of goods can take little longer due to large number of requests during sale or holiday periods. However, we kindly ask you to hold on to your registration of the parcel to enable potential investigations for the parcel. Naturally we are trying to re-book your parcel as soon as possible. Naturally we can only accept unused, unworn goods without traces of usage and which still bears the original labels. 8.5 Can I return the goods I have purchased the MAC online store MAC outlet or at any MAC retailer? The MAC online store operates independently from other MAC retailers. Newsletter 2.1 Subscription You can subscribe to receive the MAC newsletter two ways. First of all you can click on „Newsletter“ the footer of the website, which lead you to the newsletter subscription page. Secondly, you can register to receive the newsletter during the check-out process. 2.2 Unsubscription of the newsletter You can unsubscribe of the MAC newsletter at all times and without justifying any reasons. In order to do that, please click on the link at the bottom of every newsletter. Upon us receiving your unsubscription of the newsletter means also, that we not use your data any longer and stop sending you our newsletters. 2.3 Revocation newsletter If you have subscribed to our newsletter and given your consent that MAC uses your data to send newsletters, you can at all times revoke this by clicking on the designated link each newsletter. After receiving your revocation, we not use your data any further and stop the sending of the newsletter immediately. 3. Collection and use of personal data 3.1 What do we do for the security of your personal data? The safety of your personal data is our biggest concern. Generally speaking, you can visit our website without leaving any data at all. Should you however place order or subscribe to our newsletter, we do need your data. Certainly, we transmit this data via SSL (secure socket layer) connection. For your own safety, our security standards for creating your password are very high. 3.2 What do we use your data for? All information you are making about yourself or your interest is exclusively used to offer you the best service possible and to improve our website to your standards. Under no circumstances is your private data forwarded to any third party for marketing or advertising reasons. In order to read our Privacy Statement, click HERE The data that is needed for reasons of business transaction is saved and be exchanged with service providers. All personal data is treated with highest security and confidentiality standards. For reasons of credit assessment and address verification and potentially collection of payment, exchange of data with correspondent companies is made. 3.3 Data Security throughout the order process. While ordering online with us, we treat your data with the highest care: All data submitted by you are protected by our technical security systems. During data transfer, we use the so-called SSL system (secure socket layer), which you can recognize by the https:// instead of the http:// your browser. This encryption protocol is used to securely transfer of data via the internet. 4. Order & order process 4.1 Order & order process? You can put your product into the shopping cart after selecting colour, width and length. Once you have placed all desired products into the shopping cart, you can go to the shopping cart and modify your selection. Should you not be able to select one of the items you wish to purchase, this means the item is currently not available. Should you be happy with your final selection, you can proceed to the checkout. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? In the MAC Mode online shop, there is no maximum or minimum order limit. However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. In the case that several people order one article the same colour, width and length combination at the same time, it is possible that we are not able to deliver all goods that have been ordered. It is possible that products that are sold out particular size and colour combination are available at later time, however this does not concern our entire product range. We are not able to make binding prediction whether or not product be available the future. We do recommend however to visit our online shop regular intervals to check for availabilities. 6. Payment methods 6.1 Which payment methods are available? The MAC online shop offers the following payment methods: Credit card (Visa & Mastercard) The MAC online shop accepts the following credit cards: Visa, Euro/Mastercard To transmit the highly sensitive data securely, we use the SSL (secure socket layer) technology to encrypt your data. We ask you to consider that orders that have been placed via credit card may take up to one day longer as the credit card details have to be verified. Paypal Paypal is free online payment service, which helps you to make payments quickly and securely. Your bank or credit card details are only stored at Paypal. Therefore they are not being transmitted while you are effectuating your payment. This makes payment via Paypal particularly secure. As Paypal payments are usually made very quickly, your merchandise can be sent out quicker. As soon as your payment has been confirmed by Paypal, your parcel is sent on its way. For more information regarding Paypal visit http://www.paypal.com Cash on delivery The amount is paid cash at delivery of the ordered goods to the postman or messenger directly. The responsible parcel service however adds delivery fine of 2-3€ per delivery to the overall amount. Prepayment Should you have selected the payment method prepayment, we reserve your items for duration of five days. During this time span, we kindly ask you to make your payment indicated on your order confirmation to the following account: Kontoinhaber: PVS Fulfillment-Service GmbH i.A. Mac Mode GmbH & Co.KGaA Kontonummer: 891 247 709 Bankleitzahl: 600 100 70 IBAN: DE20 6001 0070 0891 2477 09 BIC: PBNKDEFF600 As soon as your payment has been received on our account, we immediately send out your purchased goods. 7. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed. This means that the order you have placed on Friday is either sent out the same day or Monday. However, we ask for your understanding that sometimes, the delivery of goods can take little longer due to large number of requests during sale or holiday periods. In order to check the status of your order, you can consult „My MAC“. As however this information depends on the logistic partner we are working with, please understand that the information is rather indication than binding information. Also, you are receiving tracking number the „Dispatch confirmation“, which you can use to track your parcel on the DHL website. 7.2 Is there express delivery? Unfortunately we do not offer express delivery at this stage. 7.3 Can I specify one address for the invoice and another for the invoice? Yes, you can specify differing delivery address. In this case, MAC may however offer only secure payment methods. Please note that this option may not apply when placing your first order the MAC online shop. 8. Returning of orders Please take note that it might very well take 5 to 7 working days until your order arrives our logistic center and can be booked back. Should you not receive any notification after over 8 working days, you can certainly contact our customer service center. However, we kindly ask you to hold on to your registration of the parcel to enable potential investigations for the parcel. Naturally we are trying to re-book your parcel as soon as possible. Please keep mind that due to seasonal influences (i.e. Christmas, holidays, sales periods…) this may take couple of days longer than usual. 8.1 How much time do I have to return goods? You can return all goods purchased the online shop without justifying any reasons within two weeks. If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label 8.2 Where do I send returns to? If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH c/o MAC Mode Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm For questions regarding your returns, please consult our service center: Phone: 0711 7252-304201, Fax: 0711 7252-30799, E-Mail: shop@mac-mode.com Only PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH he right to return goods purchased the MAC online shop. We kindly ask you not to send any merchandise purchased the MAC online shop to the MAC headquarters directly. 8.3 How are my returns balanced out with my customer account? If you have already paid for your order via prepayment, cash on delivery or credit card, we reimburse the amount onto your account. Please make sure to supply us with your account details on the return slip. 8.4 In which condition do I have to return items? Naturally we can only accept unused, unworn goods without traces of usage and which still bears the original labels. 8.5 Can I return the goods I have purchased the MAC online store MAC outlet or at any MAC retailer? The MAC online store operates independently from other MAC retailers. Therefore, we ask you to take note that it is neither possible to return nor make complaint regarding products purchased the MAC online shop or vice versa. Should you want to return or complain about MAC products you have purchased at MAC retailer, we kindly ask you to return this items to the MAC retailer conjunction with the receipt. 9. Complaints High product quality is MAC’s priority. Unfortunately, rare cases small number of items does not reflect our high quality standards. Should this be the case with your MAC product, we kindly ask you to accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused. Please do return the product regarding the complaint together with short description of your complaint and your contact data to the following address: PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH Retourenabteilung c/o MAC Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm A member of our service team check your complaint and get touch with you shortly afterwards. Please do keep mind that we can only and exclusively accept complaints regarding products that have been purchased the MAC online shop under this address. About Us Privacy Newsletter Sitemap FAQ

Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? In the MAC Mode online shop, there is no maximum or minimum order limit. However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. In the case that several people order one article the same colour, width and length combination at the same time, it is possible that we are not able to deliver all goods that have been ordered. It is possible that products that are sold out particular size and colour combination are available at later time, however this does not concern our entire product range. We are not able to make binding prediction whether or not product be available the future. We do recommend however to visit our online shop regular intervals to check for availabilities. 6. Payment methods 6.1 Which payment methods are available? The MAC online shop offers the following payment methods: Credit card (Visa & Mastercard) The MAC online shop accepts the following credit cards: Visa, Euro/Mastercard To transmit the highly sensitive data securely, we use the SSL (secure socket layer) technology to encrypt your data. We ask you to consider that orders that have been placed via credit card may take up to one day longer as the credit card details have to be verified. Paypal Paypal is free online payment service, which helps you to make payments quickly and securely. Your bank or credit card details are only stored at Paypal. Therefore they are not being transmitted while you are effectuating your payment. This makes payment via Paypal particularly secure. As Paypal payments are usually made very quickly, your merchandise can be sent out quicker. As soon as your payment has been confirmed by Paypal, your parcel is sent on its way. For more information regarding Paypal visit http://www.paypal.com Cash on delivery The amount is paid cash at delivery of the ordered goods to the postman or messenger directly. The responsible parcel service however adds delivery fine of 2-3€ per delivery to the overall amount. Prepayment Should you have selected the payment method prepayment, we reserve your items for duration of five days. During this time span, we kindly ask you to make your payment indicated on your order confirmation to the following account: Kontoinhaber: PVS Fulfillment-Service GmbH i.A. Mac Mode GmbH & Co.KGaA Kontonummer: 891 247 709 Bankleitzahl: 600 100 70 IBAN: DE20 6001 0070 0891 2477 09 BIC: PBNKDEFF600 As soon as your payment has been received on our account, we immediately send out your purchased goods. 7. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed. This means that the order you have placed on Friday is either sent out the same day or Monday. However, we ask for your understanding that sometimes, the delivery of goods can take little longer due to large number of requests during sale or holiday periods. In order to check the status of your order, you can consult „My MAC“. As however this information depends on the logistic partner we are working with, please understand that the information is rather indication than binding information. Also, you are receiving tracking number the „Dispatch confirmation“, which you can use to track your parcel on the DHL website. 7.2 Is there express delivery? Unfortunately we do not offer express delivery at this stage. 7.3 Can I specify one address for the invoice and another for the invoice? Yes, you can specify differing delivery address. In this case, MAC may however offer only secure payment methods. Please note that this option may not apply when placing your first order the MAC online shop. 8. Returning of orders Please take note that it might very well take 5 to 7 working days until your order arrives our logistic center and can be booked back. Should you not receive any notification after over 8 working days, you can certainly contact our customer service center. However, we kindly ask you to hold on to your registration of the parcel to enable potential investigations for the parcel. Naturally we are trying to re-book your parcel as soon as possible. Please keep mind that due to seasonal influences (i.e. Christmas, holidays, sales periods…) this may take couple of days longer than usual. 8.1 How much time do I have to return goods? You can return all goods purchased the online shop without justifying any reasons within two weeks. If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label 8.2 Where do I send returns to? If you wish to make use of your 14 day right of withdrawal, please use the return form enclosed your package and the DHL return label PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH c/o MAC Mode Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm For questions regarding your returns, please consult our service center: Phone: 0711 7252-304201, Fax: 0711 7252-30799, E-Mail: shop@mac-mode.com Only PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH he right to return goods purchased the MAC online shop. We kindly ask you not to send any merchandise purchased the MAC online shop to the MAC headquarters directly. 8.3 How are my returns balanced out with my customer account? If you have already paid for your order via prepayment, cash on delivery or credit card, we reimburse the amount onto your account. Please make sure to supply us with your account details on the return slip. 8.4 In which condition do I have to return items? Naturally we can only accept unused, unworn goods without traces of usage and which still bears the original labels. 8.5 Can I return the goods I have purchased the MAC online store MAC outlet or at any MAC retailer? The MAC online store operates independently from other MAC retailers. Therefore, we ask you to take note that it is neither possible to return nor make complaint regarding products purchased the MAC online shop or vice versa. Should you want to return or complain about MAC products you have purchased at MAC retailer, we kindly ask you to return this items to the MAC retailer conjunction with the receipt. 9. Complaints High product quality is MAC’s priority. Unfortunately, rare cases small number of items does not reflect our high quality standards. Should this be the case with your MAC product, we kindly ask you to accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused. Please do return the product regarding the complaint together with short description of your complaint and your contact data to the following address: PVS Fulfillment Service GmbH Retourenabteilung c/o MAC Werner-Haas-Str. 5 74172 Neckarsulm A member of our service team check your complaint and get touch with you shortly afterwards. Please do keep mind that we can only and exclusively accept complaints regarding products that have been purchased the MAC online shop under this address. About Us Privacy Newsletter Sitemap FAQ

At “My MAC” you can change your password the category “My Profile”. Please log and go to “Change password”. Please keep mind that your password has to consist of at least 5 digits. 1.5 What can I do if I forgot my password or my username? If you forgot your password for your „My MAC“ account, please click the „forgot password“ link and we send you email to reset your password to the email address you registered with, which explain how to proceed. 2. Newsletter 2.1 Subscription You can subscribe to receive the MAC newsletter two ways. First of all you can click on „Newsletter“ the footer of the website, which lead you to the newsletter subscription page. Secondly, you can register to receive the newsletter during the check-out process. 2.2 Unsubscription of the newsletter You can unsubscribe of the MAC newsletter at all times and without justifying any reasons. In order to do that, please click on the link at the bottom of every newsletter. Upon us receiving your unsubscription of the newsletter means also, that we not use your data any longer and stop sending you our newsletters. 2.3 Revocation newsletter If you have subscribed to our newsletter and given your consent that MAC uses your data to send newsletters, you can at all times revoke this by clicking on the designated link each newsletter. After receiving your revocation, we not use your data any further and stop the sending of the newsletter immediately. 3. Collection and use of personal data 3.1 What do we do for the security of your personal data? The safety of your personal data is our biggest concern. Generally speaking, you can visit our website without leaving any data at all. Should you however place order or subscribe to our newsletter, we do need your data. Certainly, we transmit this data via SSL (secure socket layer) connection. For your own safety, our security standards for creating your password are very high. 3.2 What do we use your data for? All information you are making about yourself or your interest is exclusively used to offer you the best service possible and to improve our website to your standards. Under no circumstances is your private data forwarded to any third party for marketing or advertising reasons. In order to read our Privacy Statement, click HERE The data that is needed for reasons of business transaction is saved and be exchanged with service providers. All personal data is treated with highest security and confidentiality standards. For reasons of credit assessment and address verification and potentially collection of payment, exchange of data with correspondent companies is made. 3.3 Data Security throughout the order process. While ordering online with us, we treat your data with the highest care: All data submitted by you are protected by our technical security systems. During data transfer, we use the so-called SSL system (secure socket layer), which you can recognize by the https:// instead of the http:// your browser. This encryption protocol is used to securely transfer of data via the internet. 4. Order & order process 4.1 Order & order process? You can put your product into the shopping cart after selecting colour, width and length. Once you have placed all desired products into the shopping cart, you can go to the shopping cart and modify your selection. Should you not be able to select one of the items you wish to purchase, this means the item is currently not available. Should you be happy with your final selection, you can proceed to the checkout. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. Throughout the next steps, you are completing the order process, which our online shop has four steps (indication of invoice address (possibly address that is differing from your invoice address)), selection of payment, payment details, verifying of payment details and final order. With your final order, you are always accepting our terms and conditions. Finally, you receive confirmation of your order via e-mail. We would like to remind you that through this confirmation, no valid contract of sale has thereby come into being. 4.2 Can I order goods the MAC online shop to be dispatched abroad? Unfortunately, orders the MAC online shop are currently only dispatched within the Federal Republic of Germany. It is currently not possible to order anything the MAC online shop and dispatch it abroad. Should you live abroad and want to purchase MAC products, please consult the MAC shopfinder order to find MAC retailers abroad. 4.3 How do I change order that has already been placed? A lot of processes that are triggered once order has been placed are automated – therefore, it is usually not possible to modify order after it has been placed our system. We ask for your understanding and apologize for any inconveniences this may cause. 4.4 Can I monitor the progress of my order? In your „My MAC“ account, you can monitor the status of your order. Also, you receive email your dispatch confirmation indicating the tracking number of your parcel 4.5 Is there minimum or maximum order limit? In the MAC Mode online shop, there is no maximum or minimum order limit. However, MAC Mode might limit the payment methods to secure payment methods - such as credit card and prepayment - depending on the amount of your order. 5.Availability The MAC online shop usually only shows products that are currently available. Despite continuous updating of inventory displays per day, some cases, products are displayed as available despite the fact that they are already sold out. In the case that several people order one article the same colour, width and length combination at the same time, it is possible that we are not able to deliver all goods that have been ordered. It is possible that products that are sold out particular size and colour combination are available at later time, however this does not concern our entire product range. We are not able to make binding prediction whether or not product be available the future. We do recommend however to visit our online shop regular intervals to check for availabilities. 6. Payment methods 6.1 Which payment methods are available? The MAC online shop offers the following payment methods: Credit card (Visa & Mastercard) The MAC online shop accepts the following credit cards: Visa, Euro/Mastercard To transmit the highly sensitive data securely, we use the SSL (secure socket layer) technology to encrypt your data. We ask you to consider that orders that have been placed via credit card may take up to one day longer as the credit card details have to be verified. Paypal Paypal is free online payment service, which helps you to make payments quickly and securely. Your bank or credit card details are only stored at Paypal. Therefore they are not being transmitted while you are effectuating your payment. This makes payment via Paypal particularly secure. As Paypal payments are usually made very quickly, your merchandise can be sent out quicker. As soon as your payment has been confirmed by Paypal, your parcel is sent on its way. For more information regarding Paypal visit http://www.paypal.com Cash on delivery The amount is paid cash at delivery of the ordered goods to the postman or messenger directly. Delivery 7.1 How long do I have to wait for my order? The usual delivery time of the MAC online shop is 3-4 days. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed. This means that the order you have placed on Friday is either sent out the same day or Monday. However, we ask for your understanding that sometimes, the delivery of goods can take little longer due to large number of requests during sale or holiday periods. Unfortunately we do not offer express delivery at this stage. 7.3 Can I specify one address for the invoice and another for the invoice? Yes, you can specify differing delivery address. In this case, MAC may however offer only secure payment methods. Please note that this option may not apply when placing your first order the MAC online shop. 8. Returning of orders Please take note that it might very well take 5 to 7 working days until your order arrives our logistic center and can be booked back. However, we kindly ask you to hold on to your registration of the parcel to enable potential investigations for the parcel. Naturally we are trying to re-book your parcel as soon as possible. Hereafter, you can either log with your „My MAC“ account, register „My MAC“ account or proceed to the check-out without registering. The merchandise is usually available and can be sent out directly or the next working day after the order has been placed.
