MAC Mode Privacy Log In EN / DE Search Click to perform search. Home Women Men News Online shop Shopfinder Company My Mac PRIVACY STATEMENT MAC 1. Your privacy is our concern We are very happy about your interest our company, our products and service and would like you to feel safe regarding your personal data and privacy. We take the safety of your privacy very serious. The compliance to the Federal Data Protection Act is matter of course for us. We would like you to know which data we collect and use. We have taken measures that ensure that we and our external service providers meet regulations regarding data protection. 2. Collection and use of personal data Personal data is information regarding your identity. Examples thereof are indications of your name, address, phone number, email address. For the use of our website, it is not necessary to leave any personal data at all. In certain cases however, it is necessary to leave personal data if you wish us to provide service. The same applies for the mailing of information material, ordered goods or reply to individual requests or questions. Should this be necessary, we point this out. In addition to that, we only safe or process data, which you make available to us voluntarily or automatically. Should you wish service, we usually only collect data, which we need to provide this service. Should we ask for additional data we only do this on voluntary basis. The processing of personal data only and exclusively serve to fulfil the requested service and to safeguard our own justified business interests. 3. Purpose of personal data Your personal data that is made available by you is generally being used to answer your queries, to deal with your oders or to give you access to particular information or offers. In order to manage customer relations, it can be necessary that we assign service provider to use this data to inform you about product offers provide you with information about our products or conduct online survey, which we use to improve our offer. Naturally we respect if you do not want to supply your personal data order to support our customer relationship (in particular for direct marketing or marketing surveys). We however under no circumstances sell your data to third parties or market them elsewhere. 4. Specific Use The personal data we have collected about you only be used for the purposes communicated to you and not be shared with third parties unless you give your explicit permission to do so. Collection of personal data, as well as their transmission to institutions that we are obligated to share data with by law or court only be carried out within the regulatory framework respectively court decision. Our employees and the service providers we collaborate with are obligated to discretion and adhering to the provisions of the German Federal Data Protection Act. 5. Duration of storage Personal data, which has been submitted via our website, be saved until its purpose has been served. Where filing periods are stipulated by the provisions of commercial and/or fiscal law, the storage period for certain data may be up to 10 years. In addition, the IP address of the customer at the time of order be saved order to assure data security (this means order to prevent misuse and for criminal prosecution) for the duration of one year. 6. Data collection Your visit on our website is protocolled. What is protocolled is generally the IP address you are using from your PC, date, time, type of browser and the operating system of your PC as well as the sites you are looking at. These circumstances do not enable us to establish connection between you and this data. This data is only used for data security reasons and to optimize our online offer. Other evaluation of this data – apart from statistical purposes and anonymous form is not made. No personal surf profiles are created or profiled. Additionally, personal data is only saved if you input the data, i.e. within the registration process, survey, raffle, online application or order to perform contract. You be informed about the purpose of the data collection and your data be transmitted encrypted form. 7. Cookies While visiting our website, we may be placing information – form of cookies – on your computer. Cookies are small text files, which are sent from webserver to your browser and are saved on your hard drive. Thereby, no personal data of the user is saved, merely the internet protocol address. This information serves to recognize you during your next visit on our website and ease your navigation. Cookies enable us to adapt our website to your interest and to save your password you don’t have to fill it each time you want to log on our website. Of course you can browse our website without cookies. In order to do so, you can avoid cookies to be saved on your hard drive, you have to select the option “Do not accept cookies” your browser settings. For detailed information, please consult the instructions of your browser manufacturer. If you do not accept cookies, certain functionality of our website might be restricted. 8. Children and adolescents Minors and underage people should not submit any personal information without the consent of their parents or guardian. We do not ask for any personal data of children and minors, do not collect or process it and certainly do not forward it to third parties. 9. Liability All information on this website has been checked thoroughly. However, we cannot take any guarantee for correctness, completeness and topicality of our contents. 10. Security We have taken technical and organisational security measures order to protect your personal data of loss, destruction, manipulation and unauthorized access. All employees and all third parties that are involved with the processing of data are obliged to comply with the German Federal Data Protection Act. In the case of collection and processing of personal data, all information is transmitted encrypted form to avoid abuse of the data by third parties. Our security measures are constantly revised and continuously adapted to technological developments. 11. Information regarding the location of the web server (§13 Ab. 1 TMG) The processing of data that we receive via our website is made on our servers Germany. 12. Changes of privacy statement We reserve the right to change our security and privacy if necessary due to technical developments. In these cases, we adapt our privacy statement accordingly. Please do check our privacy statement for updates. 13. Links to other websites Occasionally, we link to websites of third parties. Despite our careful selection process to do so, we cannot give any guarantee or liability for correctness, completeness and topicality of its contents. Also, this privacy statement does not apply to websites we have linked to. Please do inform yourself about the privacy statements associated with these sites directly. 14. Right of access and right to object Should you not want the storing of your personal data or the data not be accurate anymore, we certainly delete your data if requested or correct them accordingly – as far as this is possible within governing law. Data for accounting and bookkeeping purposes are not affected by retraction or deletion. If you wish so, you may receive information regarding all personal data that we have saved about you our database.
